mainHero.title: Emna
mainHero.subtitle: Hammami.
mainHero.description: A passionate developer, Bringing projects to life with flair, A great team player, strong and bright, Always eager to learn and thrive.

items.title: A plug n play template
items.description: Just edit the config.json file with details about your company and voila your beautiful state of the art landing page is ready to go live! Remember to also update your assets, add any images you want to show to /assets/images and link them in the config.json

items.title: Make it your own!
items.description: Play around with the theme.ts file and configure the color palette to match the branding of your company! If you're feeling wild, maybe change some tailwind css as well!

features.title: Latest & greatest
features.subtitle: All the best technologies out there!
features.description: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.

items.name: React.js
items.description: React is a free and open-source front-end JavaScript library for building user interfaces or UI components.

items.name: Tailwind
items.description: Tailwind CSS is a highly customizable, low-level CSS framework for quickly creating beautiful designs without any annoying opinionated stylesheet nonsense.

items.name: Next.js
items.description: Next.js is a framework for server-rendered React applications using Next.js.

items.name: Typescript
items.description: TypeScript is a programming language developed and maintained by Microsoft.

certificates.description: Demonstrated expertise in designing distributed systems on AWS platform
Advanced React development skills including hooks, context, and performance optimization
Expertise in building scalable applications on Google Cloud Platform
Proven ability to install, configure, and manage Kubernetes clusters
